review_text: I thoroughly enjoyed Dune and think its the best sci-fi book in the world!
The girl with the dragon tattoo is the first of 3 books in the millenium series by Stieg Larsson. It was this book that got me hooked on the trilogy and i love it!
Game of thrones is a much better book than tv show. I would highly recommend anyone who has seen the tv show and were dissapointed to read the book!
